import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { LiquidGlassCard, LiquidGlassCardHeader, LiquidGlassCardContent } from "../components/ui/liquid-glass"; import { FadeIn, ScaleIn, StaggerContainer, StaggerItem } from "../components/ScrollAnimations"; import { BikeBearText, AppleRevealText } from "../components/BikeBearAnimations"; import { Star, Quote, User, Calendar, ThumbsUp } from "lucide-react"; import { useTheme } from "../contexts/ThemeContext"; const Testimonials = () => { const { colors, isDark } = useTheme(); const [testimonials, setTestimonials] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchTestimonials(); }, []); const fetchTestimonials = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL}/api/testimonials`); setTestimonials(response.data); setLoading(false); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching testimonials:', error); // Fallback to mock data setTestimonials([ { id: 1, name: "Sarah Johnson", role: "Business Owner", content: "Excellent service! My laptop was running slow and they fixed it in just 2 hours. The team is professional and the pricing is very reasonable. Highly recommend!", rating: 5, created_at: "2024-01-15" }, { id: 2, name: "Michael Chen", role: "Student", content: "Fast and reliable service. They upgraded my laptop's RAM and it's working perfectly now. Great value for money and excellent customer service.", rating: 5, created_at: "2024-01-10" }, { id: 3, name: "Emily Rodriguez", role: "Professional", content: "Professional team with excellent customer service. They recovered all my important files after my laptop crashed. Will definitely use their services again.", rating: 5, created_at: "2024-01-08" }, { id: 4, name: "David Kumar", role: "Freelancer", content: "Outstanding service! They replaced my laptop screen and it looks brand new. The repair was done quickly and the quality is excellent.", rating: 5, created_at: "2024-01-05" }, { id: 5, name: "Lisa Wang", role: "Teacher", content: "Very satisfied with their service. They fixed my laptop's keyboard issue and also cleaned up my system. My laptop is running much faster now.", rating: 5, created_at: "2024-01-03" }, { id: 6, name: "Ahmad Rahman", role: "Engineer", content: "Great experience! They upgraded my laptop's SSD and the performance improvement is amazing. Professional service and fair pricing.", rating: 5, created_at: "2024-01-01" } ]); setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (
); } return (

); }; export default Testimonials;
